Description: Set up continuous deployment to Digital Ocean
Support multiple Google Drive data sources
Make sure that the server-side environment works locally
Point mylocal.farm at Digital Ocean instead of Azure
Introduce an 'POST ~/login' endpoint that receives an email address
Send a '~/authenticate/${password}' link to that email
Introduce an endpoint that handles the '~/authenticate/${password}' link
When the '~/authenticate/${password}' is valid - send an access_token
When the '~/authenticate/${password}' is invalid - send a 401 response
Give the production server access to the secret appsettings.json values
